parameters.name: mms1_des_errorflags_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES 32-bit vector of data-quality indicators at burst-start time

parameters.name: mms1_des_compressionloss_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES compression lossless/lossy indicator at survey-start time

parameters.name: mms1_des_steptable_parity_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES step table parity, this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_startdelphi_count_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES Del-Phi (obs spin-phase) count at burst-start time

parameters.name: mms1_des_startdelphi_angle_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES Del-Phi (obs spin-phase) angle at burst-start time

parameters.name: mms1_des_sector_despinp_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES sector de-Spin P value, this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_pitchangdist_lowen_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron pitch-angle distribution for "low" energies during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_pitchangdist_miden_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES electron pitch-angle distribution for "mid" energies during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_pitchangdist_highen_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES electron pitch-angle distribution for "high" energies during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_energyspectr_px_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron energy spectrum "near" +X_DSC during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_energyspectr_mx_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES electron energy spectrum "near" -X_DSC during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_energyspectr_py_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES electron energy spectrum "near" +Y_DSC during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_energyspectr_my_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES electron energy spectrum "near" -Y_DSC during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_energyspectr_pz_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES electron energy spectrum "near" +Z_DSC during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_energyspectr_mz_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES electron energy spectrum "near" -Z_DSC during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_energyspectr_par_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron energy parallel spectrum 30 degrees parallel to B during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_energyspectr_anti_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES electron energy anti-parallel spectrum 30 degrees anti-parallel to B during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_energyspectr_perp_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES electron energy perpendicular spectrum 60 degrees perpendicular to B during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_energyspectr_omni_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES omni-directional electron energy spectrum during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_numberdensity_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron number density during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_numberdensity_brst_noerr
parameters.description: ---> (no error bars displayed) MMS1 FPI/DES electron number density during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_numberdensity_err_brst
parameters.description: ---> MMS1 FPI/DES electron number density error during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_densityextrapolation_low_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES estimated (via extrapolation to 0) contribution to density integral below 10eV

parameters.name: mms1_des_densityextrapolation_high_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES estimated (via extrapolation to infinity) contribution to density integral above 30keV

parameters.name: mms1_des_bulkv_dbcs_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron bulk-velocity DBCS vector during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_bulkv_spintone_dbcs_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron bulk-velocity estimated spintone vector in DBCS during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_bulkv_dbcs_brst_noerr
parameters.description: ---> (no error bars displayed) MMS1 FPI/DES electron bulk-velocity DBCS vector during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_bulkv_gse_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron bulk-velocity GSE vector during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_bulkv_spintone_gse_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron bulk-velocity estimated spintone vector in GSE during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_bulkv_gse_brst_noerr
parameters.description: ---> (no error bars displayed) MMS1 FPI/DES electron bulk-velocity GSE vector during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_bulkv_spin_dbcs_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron bulk-velocity spintone vector in DBCS during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_bulkv_spin_gse_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron bulk-velocity spintone vector in GSE during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_prestensor_dbcs_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron pressure tensor DBCS matrix during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_prestensor_gse_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron pressure tensor GSE matrix during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_temptensor_dbcs_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron temperature tensor DBCS matrix during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_temptensor_gse_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron temperature tensor GSE matrix during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_heatq_dbcs_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron heat-flux DBCS vector during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_heatq_gse_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron heat-flux GSE vector during this burst

parameters.name: mms1_des_temppara_brst
parameters.description: MMS1 FPI/DES electron parallel temperature during this BP
